_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: WebHosting
author: braddevans123@gmail.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/sh
shopt -s extglob
# Switch to mounted directory
cd /mnt/server
# Update installation system and install curl
apt-get update
apt-get install -y curl nginx
ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "amd64" || echo "arm64")

# Cleanup previous install if available
if [ -z "$(ls -A /home/container)" ]; then
   echo "directory found to be Empty";
   git clone https://github.com/braddevans/pter-nginx-egg.git /tmp/egg
   ls -lash /tmp/egg/
   cp /tmp/egg/container/* . -v
   ln -S /home/container/conf/nginx-site.conf /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/site.conf
else
   echo "Not Empty"
fi

variables.name: Site Name
variables.description: The version of Prometheus to install. By default the latest version is being installed.

variables.name: Site port
variables.description: The version of Prometheus to install. By default the latest version is being installed.
